name: In re ESTATE of Lloyd E. JACOBS, Deceased. Appeal of Deborah Ann Jacobs SMITH

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ESTATE of Lloyd E. JACOBS, Deceased. Appeal of Deborah Ann Jacobs SMITH.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
O’BRIEN, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel W. Shoemaker, York, for appellant.
Jordon D. Cunningham, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1153
In re ESTATE of Lloyd E. JACOBS, Deceased. Appeal of Deborah Ann Jacobs SMITH.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 19, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Daniel W. Shoemaker, York, for appellant.
Jordon D. Cunningham, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
